title: #ICYMI Meet the new VW Golf 8, Hyundai's 300kW minibus - Top motoring stories of the day
text:
Hyundai taps into a new market with its 300kW H1 minibus. Lance Branquinho writes about

Volkswagen will be taking the covers off the 8th generation of its popular Golf, with more than 35-million units sold throughout the world, it is still one of the brand's top-selling models.

In case you missed it

Akivan Kemraj gets behind the wheel of the Volkswagen Amarok V6 TDI, see what he has to say about the popular bakkie.

From Prince's song called Little Red Corvette to Bruce Springsteen's 1984 Pink Cadillac track, take a look at song titles named after cars.

The annual Snow+Rock Enduro Event takes place this weekend at the Afriski Mountain Resort in Lesotho.

description: VW will take off the wraps of the new Golf 8 in a global debut, and Hyundai produces a very potent 300kW H1 N minibus. Your top motoring stories of the day.
